Headline: Brown Line Trains Resume Stopping at Sedgwick Station
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains have resumed making stops at Sedgwick Station.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Brown Line trains have resumed making stops at Sedgwick Station.

Headline: No trains between Garfield and 95th
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and 95th due to a mechanical problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and 95th due to a mechanical problem.

As a result, trains are operating only between Garfield and Howard at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Garfield and 95th to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
